Subskills.name: Battle Experienced
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by lance thrust.

Subskills.name: Pole Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the range of lance thrust.

Subskills.name: Head Collector
Subskills.description: Lance thrust pulls monsters towards you and stuns them on hit.

Subskills.name: Heroic Arrival
Subskills.description: Increases stun duration and damage when colliding with commending banner.

Subskills.name: Punctured Organs
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Tactical Distancing
Subskills.description: Knock monsters back on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Swift Striking
Subskills.description: Chance to gain a stack of swift strikes on hit increasing your attack speed and attack rating.

Subskills.name: Polearm Expertise
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by lance thrust when using polearms.

Subskills.name: Commend to Onslaught
Subskills.description: Unleash additional lance thrusts towards nearby monsters from commending banner on banner impact.

Subskills.name: Blood Harvester
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Stab Sequence
Subskills.description: Every third attack with lance thrust is empowered increasing range and damage slowing monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Volatile Irontip
Subskills.description: Collision with commending banner causes it to explode dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Legion Exterminator
Subskills.description: Unleash a whirl attack with increased area of effect radius. Lance thrust no longer collides with commending banner.

Subskills.name: Trust in the Thrust
Subskills.description: Unleash a circle of lances thrusting the first target on hit from all directions.
